text: I saw two men arguing by the fountain around 8:45 PM. One man in a black hoodie pulled out something shiny and stabbed the other. The victim fell immediately.
It was closer to 9 PM when I noticed three people together. One in a grey hoodie was holding the victim, then another person ran away.
I only caught someone running off quickly, maybe holding a knife. They were wearing dark clothes but I couldn’t see their face.
I think it happened before 8:50 PM. A tall guy in dark jeans shoved the other man, then there was a sudden movement like a punch, but I think it was a knife.
From across the park, I heard shouting and then saw a man collapse. Couldn’t see who did it clearly, just dark clothing and fast movement.
